com.baasbox.android

Class Filter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.baasbox.android.Filter

  • public class Filter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a query filter that can be applied to batch requests on collections, users and files.
    Since:
    0.7.3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Filter ANY
      A filter that does not apply any restriction to the request.

    • Method Detail

      • paging

        public static Filter paging(java.lang.String order,
            boolean asc,
            int page,
            int records)
        Returns a new filter that applies pagination to the request using the given order, page number and records page.
        Parameters:
        order - the field to use for sorting
        asc - true if sorting should be ascending false otherwise
        page - the page number to retrieve
        records - the number of entity to return per page
        Returns:
        a configured filter

      • setOrderBy

        public Filter setOrderBy(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the sort order to use with this filter.
        Parameters:
        name -
        Returns:

        public Filter setPaging(int page,
               int numrecords)
        Configures pagination for this filter
        Parameters:
        page -
        numrecords -
        Returns:

      • where

        public static Filter where(java.lang.String where,
           java.lang.Object... params)
        Returns a new filter that applies the given where condition to the request. Where condition can be parameterized using '?', params will be filled using the provided params. Where conditions are simply passed to the server database, their syntax is thus the same of OrientDB see: Orient SQL Where reference for a complete reference.
        Parameters:
        where - a string
        params - params to fill in the condition
        Returns:
        a configured filter

      • setWhere

        public Filter setWhere(java.lang.CharSequence clause,
              java.lang.Object... args)
        Sets the where condition for this filter,
        Parameters:
        clause - a string
        args - arguments to use in the condition
        Returns:
        this filter with this where condition set
        See Also:
        where(String, Object...)

      • sort

        public static Filter sort(java.lang.String order,
          boolean asc)
        Returns a new filter that applies the provided sort order to the request.
        Parameters:
        order - a field to use for sorting
        asc - true if sorting should be ascending false otherwise
        Returns:
        a configured Filter
